slide.example: 67 requests/sec Base Optimized PHP 4.3 75 requests/sec Add APC 108 requests/sec APC+apc_load_constants() 139 requests/sec APC+MINIT Constants 153 requests/sec APC+MINIT+FastXSL 186 requests/sec APC+MINIT+Cheat 188 requests/sec APC+MINIT+Cheat+OO in C 188 requests/sec APC+MINIT+Cheat+OO in C+myupper
